item.title: Alert Box
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1452884156043{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][ultimate_heading main_heading="ALERT BOX" main_heading_color="#444444" spacer="line_only" spacer_position="middle" line_height="3" line_color="#329ca8" main_heading_font_size="desktop:50px;mobile:38px;" sub_heading_font_size="desktop:17px;" line_width="50" spacer_margin="margin-top:5px;"]

Alert box is an element where you can display important messages & notices to visitors. The Box can be hidden by a simple click. Unlimited color choices & Icons.

[/ultimate_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1452884299465{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][sy_alertbox title_text="Warning !" message_text="Something went wrong please try again." icon="Defaults-exclamation-triangle warning" color="#ffffff" box_bg_color="#dd2323" border_thickness="1" border_color="#dd2323" radius="0" bg_color="#dd3333"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1452884299465{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][sy_alertbox title_text="Success !" message_text="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. " icon="Defaults-check" color="#ffffff" box_bg_color="#42b223" border_thickness="1" border_color="#36b213" radius="0" bg_color="#3faa22"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][sy_alertbox title_text="Important !" message_text="Mauris velit quam, porttitor at dolor id, pharetra mollis eros." icon="Defaults-exclamation-triangle warning" color="rgba(0,0,0,0.5)" box_bg_color="#e2e52d" border_thickness="1" border_color="#e1e512" radius="0" bg_color="#e2e522"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1452884735202{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][sy_alertbox title_text="RING !" message_text="Suspendisse a felis magna. " icon="Defaults-bell" color="#ffffff" box_bg_color="#0769bf" border_thickness="1" border_color="#0769bf" radius="0" bg_color="#1e73be"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][sy_alertbox title_text="Help !" message_text="Mauris velit quam porttitor." icon="Defaults-life-bouy life-buoy life-ring life-saver support" color="#ffffff" box_bg_color="#790fe2" border_thickness="1" border_color="#790fe2" radius="0" bg_color="#8224e3"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][sy_alertbox title_text="Chat !" message_text="We need to talk." icon="Defaults-comments" color="#ffffff" box_bg_color="#f76b00" border_thickness="1" border_color="#f76b00" radius="0" bg_color="#f76b00"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1452884990632{padding-right: 50px !important;padding-left: 50px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

You can change the widthof the alert box and it's position depending on how much the message or notice is important. To close themessage or notices just click the close icon & it will disappear with a fade out effect

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Modal Window
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1452884156043{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][ultimate_heading main_heading="MODAL WINDOW" main_heading_color="#444444" spacer="line_only" spacer_position="middle" line_height="3" line_color="#329ca8" main_heading_font_size="desktop:50px;mobile:38px;" sub_heading_font_size="desktop:17px;" line_width="50" spacer_margin="margin-top:5px;"]

Modal Window is a hidden area that will be shown when you click the show trigger button. This element can be used when you want to display some messages or information to visitors in a cool & modern way.

[/ultimate_heading][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1452892756453{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

Click BUTTON to see the magic

item.title: Post Mansory

item.title: Team Mate
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" bg_type="image" parallax_style="vcpb-default" bg_image_new="539|http://localhost/sayen/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/cloud-5.jpg" bg_img_attach="fixed" parallax_content="parallax_content_value" parallax_content_sense="50" fadeout_row="fadeout_row_value" fadeout_start_effect="50" enable_overlay="enable_overlay_value" overlay_color="#000000" overlay_pattern="transperant" overlay_pattern_opacity="70" css=".vc_custom_1453047671746{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 300px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;}"][vc_column][ultimate_heading main_heading="TEAM MATE" main_heading_color="#ffffff" spacer="line_only" spacer_position="middle" line_height="3" line_color="#329ca8" main_heading_font_size="desktop:50px;mobile:38px;" sub_heading_font_size="desktop:17px;" line_width="50" spacer_margin="margin-top:5px;"]

Team Mate is a way to give information about someone you have worked with. You can provide his/her Social Profile links & more.

[/ultimate_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1453068537174{margin-top: 70px !important;margin-bottom: 70px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][sy_teammate img="1099" name="Sarah Parker" position="Photographer " scl_color="#e1e1e1" fb_link="#" tw_link="#" lk_link="#" insta_link="#" name_size="18" name_color="#1e73be" position_size="14" position_color="#aaaaaa"]

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.

[/sy_teammate][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][sy_teammate img="819" name="Patrick Jane" position="Web Designer " scl_color="#e1e1e1" fb_link="#" tw_link="#" lk_link="#" insta_link="#" name_size="18" name_color="#1e73be" position_size="14" position_color="#aaaaaa"]

item.title: Animation Block
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1452884156043{margin-top: 50px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column][ultimate_heading main_heading="ANIMATION BLOCK" main_heading_color="#444444" spacer="line_only" spacer_position="middle" line_height="3" line_color="#329ca8" main_heading_font_size="desktop:50px;mobile:38px;" sub_heading_font_size="desktop:17px;" line_width="50" spacer_margin="margin-top:5px;" margin_design_tab_text=""]

Animation block is an element container where you can put any other element to be apply show/hide Animation effects.

Here is a small list of animation effects you can apply on any element.

[/ultimate_heading][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1452952640993{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInDown" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="Defaults-star" icon_size="40" icon_color="#1a9ead" title="Ultricies Necus" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:18px;" title_font_color="#333333" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#888888"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am aloneand feel the charm of existence in this spot.

[/bsf-info-box][/ult_animation_block][ultimate_spacer height="50"][ult_animation_block animation="rotateIn" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][ult_buttons btn_font_size="desktop:18px;"][/ult_animation_block][ultimate_spacer height="50"][ult_animation_block animation="zoomIn" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0" btn_icon_pos="ubtn-sep-icon-at-left" btn_font_size="desktop:18px;"][/ult_animation_block][ultimate_spacer height="50"][ult_animation_block animation="InfiniteRotate" animation_duration="2" animation_delay=".5" animation_iteration_count="1"][ult_buttons btn_title="Rotate" btn_align="ubtn-center" btn_size="ubtn-small" btn_title_color="#ffffff" btn_bg_color="#873260" icon_size="32" btn_icon_pos="ubtn-sep-icon-at-left" btn_font_size="desktop:18px;"][/ult_animation_block][ultimate_spacer height="50"][ult_animation_block animation="InfiniteHorizontalShake" animation_duration="1.5" animation_delay=".5" animation_iteration_count="1"][ult_buttons btn_title="Horizontal Shake" btn_align="ubtn-center" btn_size="ubtn-small" btn_title_color="#ffffff" btn_bg_color="#376b52" icon_size="32" btn_icon_pos="ubtn-sep-icon-at-left" btn_font_size="desktop:18px;"][/ult_animation_block][ultimate_spacer height="50"][ult_animation_block animation="InfiniteHorizontalScaleFlip" animation_duration="1.5" animation_delay=".5" animation_iteration_count="1"][ult_buttons btn_title="Scale Flip" btn_align="ubtn-center" btn_size="ubtn-small" btn_title_color="#ffffff" btn_bg_color="#56a0d3" icon_size="32" btn_icon_pos="ubtn-sep-icon-at-left" btn_font_size="desktop:18px;"][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInUpBig" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="Defaults-bell-o" icon_size="40" icon_color="#1a9ead" title="Ultricies Necus" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:18px;" title_font_color="#333333" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#888888"]

item.title: Home Version 1
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1454281041685{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454326330048{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInUp" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="icomoon-html-five" icon_size="48" icon_color="#289fca" title="Crafted With Pride" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:19px;" title_font_color="#289fca" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#666666"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart, I am alone.

[/bsf-info-box][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454326338279{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInUp" animation_duration="1" animation_delay=".3" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="icomoon-quill" icon_size="48" icon_color="#289fca" title="Unique Styling" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:19px;" title_font_color="#289fca" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#666666"]

And feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend.

[/bsf-info-box][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454326347784{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInUp" animation_duration="1" animation_delay=".6" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="icomoon-equalizer22" icon_size="48" icon_color="#289fca" title="Advanced Admin Panel " pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:19px;" title_font_color="#289fca" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#666666"]

So absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke.

[/bsf-info-box][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1454282075176{padding-top: 10px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454326357943{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInUp" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="icomoon-devices_other" icon_size="48" icon_color="#289fca" title="Fully Responsive" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:19px;" title_font_color="#289fca" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#666666"]

At the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now. When, while the lovely lorem valley teems.

[/bsf-info-box][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454326365814{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInUp" animation_duration="1" animation_delay=".3" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="icomoon-trophy" icon_size="48" icon_color="#289fca" title="Premium Support" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:19px;" title_font_color="#289fca" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#666666"]

With vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable slim shady foliage of my trees.

[/bsf-info-box][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1454326374926{padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInUp" animation_duration="1" animation_delay=".6" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="icomoon-fire" icon_size="48" icon_color="#289fca" title="Hot Features" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:19px;" title_font_color="#289fca" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#666666"]

And but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream.

[/bsf-info-box][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1454323414275{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #fcfcfc !important;border-top-color: #f3f3f3 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #f3f3f3 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"][vc_column][ult_animation_block animation="zoomIn" animation_duration=".5" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][bsf-info-box icon="icomoon-stack" icon_size="48" icon_color="#289fca" title="Amazing Shortcodes Bundle" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:28px;" title_font_color="#289fca" desc_font_size="desktop:15px;" desc_font_color="#777777"]

Kameleon comes bundled with amazing & unique shortcodes, no limits forstyling possibilities.

With Visual Composer & Kameleon shortcodes you can create unique pages using the shortcodes bundle that we offer with our themes. Easy to use & to customize every element is crafted with care and love. A well documentation is provided to help you get started with Kameleon shortcodes.

Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia.

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite.

item.title: Suspendisse Quis
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1452812914029{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f8f8f8 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452619755549{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1452813373411{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452619179895{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="285" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1452619169848{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1452812966845{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #111111 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452619927384{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="290" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1452619916335{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452619831598{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1452813463009{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]

When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth.

Jane Doe

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1452812925823{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f8f8f8 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452619774509{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1452813359059{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"]

Familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies, then I feel the presence of the Almighty, who formed us in his own image, and the breath of that universal love which bears and sustains us, as it floats around us in an eternity of bliss; and then, my friend, when darkness overspreads my eyes. I feel the presence of the Almighty

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452619484744{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="289" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1452619578160{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1452812935128{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #111111 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452619514192{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_single_image image="287" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1452619598087{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452619785269{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text]

John Doe

Like the form of a beloved mistress, then I often think with longing, Oh, would I could describe these conceptions, could impress upon paper all that is living so full and warm within me, that it might be the mirror of my soul, as my soul is the mirror of the infinite God! O my friend -- but it is too much for my strength .

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Crazy People
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.
I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now.

item.title: Into the Wild
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment.

 

His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked. "What's happened to me? " he thought. It wasn't a dream. His room, a proper human room although a little too small, lay peacefully between its four familiar walls.

 

A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table - Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame. It showed a lady fitted out with a fur hat and fur boa who sat upright, raising a heavy fur muff that covered the whole of her lower arm towards the viewer.

item.excerpt:encoded: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.

item.title: Portfolio w/ Video
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
However hard he threw himself onto his right, he always rolled back to where he was. He must have tried it a hundred times, shut his eyes so that he wouldn't have to look at the floundering legs, and only stopped when he began to feel a mild, dull pain there that he had never felt before. "Oh, God", he thought, "what a strenuous career it is that I've chosen!
Travelling day in and day out. Doing business like this takes much more effort than doing your own business at home, and on top of that there's the curse of travelling, worries about making train connections, bad and irregular food, contact with different people.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Second Life from Nils Favre on Vimeo.

item.title: Into the woods
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
Indeed, in other respects, you can hardly regard any creatures of the deep with the same feelings that you do those of the shore. For though some old naturalists have maintained that all creatures of the land are of their kind in the sea; and though taking a broad general view of the thing, this may very well be; yet coming to specialties, where, for example, does the ocean furnish any fish that in disposition answers to the sagacious kindness of the dog? The accursed shark alone can in any generic respect be said to bear comparative analogy to him. But though, to landsmen in general, the native inhabitants of the seas have ever been regarded with emotions unspeakably unsocial and repelling; though we know the sea to be an everlasting terra incognita, so that Columbus sailed over numberless unknown worlds to discover his one superficial western one; though, by vast odds, the most terrific of all mortal disasters have immemorially and indiscriminately befallen tens and hundreds of thousands of those who have gone upon the waters; though but a moment's consideration will teach, that however baby man may brag of his science and skill, and however much, in a flattering future. That science and skill may augment; yet for ever and for ever, to the crack of doom, the sea will insult and murder him, and pulverize the stateliest, stiffest frigate he can make; nevertheless, by the continual repetition of these very impressions, man has lost that sense of the full awfulness of the sea which aboriginally belongs to it.
The first boat we read of, floated on an ocean, that with Portuguese vengeance had whelmed a whole world without leaving so much as a widow. That same ocean rolls now; that same ocean destroyed the wrecked ships of last year. Yea, foolish mortals, Noah's flood is not yet subsided; two thirds of the fair world it yet covers.
Wherein differ the sea and the land, that a miracle upon one is not a miracle upon the other? Preternatural terrors rested upon the Hebrews, when under the feet of Korah and his company the live ground opened and swallowed them up for ever; yet not a modern sun ever sets, but in precisely the same manner the live sea swallows up ships and crews. But not only is the sea such a foe to man who is an alien to it, but it is also a fiend to its own off-spring; worse than the Persian host who murdered his own guests; sparing not the creatures which itself hath spawned. Like a savage tigress that tossing in the jungle overlays her own cubs, so the sea dashes even the mightiest whales against the rocks, and leaves them there side by side with the split wrecks of ships. No mercy, no power but its own controls it. Panting and snorting like a mad battle steed that has lost its rider, the masterless ocean overruns the globe. Consider the subtleness of the sea; how its most dreaded creatures glide under water, unapparent for the most part, and treacherously hidden beneath the loveliest tints of azure. Consider also the devilish brilliance and beauty of many of its most remorseless tribes, as the dainty embellished shape of many species of sharks. Consider, once more, the universal cannibalism of the sea; all whose creatures prey upon each other, carrying on eternal war since the world began.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Into The Woods

item.title: Discover the Nature
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
One, with a fan and some bits of paper, performed the graceful trick of the butterflies and the flowers; another traced in the air, with the odorous smoke of his pipe, a series of blue words, which composed a compliment to the audience; while a third juggled with some lighted candles, which he extinguished successively as they passed his lips, and relit again without interrupting for an instant his juggling. Another reproduced the most singular combinations with a spinning-top; in his hands the revolving tops seemed to be animated with a life of their own in their interminable whirling; they ran over pipe-stems, the edges of sabres. Wires and even hairs stretched across the stage; they turned around on the edges of large glasses, crossed bamboo ladders, dispersed into all the corners, and produced strange musical effects by the combination of their various pitches of tone. The jugglers tossed them in the air, threw them like shuttlecocks with wooden battledores, and yet they kept on spinning; they put them into their pockets, and took them out still whirling as before.
It is useless to describe the astonishing performances of the acrobats and gymnasts. The turning on ladders, poles, balls, barrels, &c., was executed with wonderful precision.
But the principal attraction was the exhibition of the Long Noses, a show to which Europe is as yet a stranger. The Long Noses form a peculiar company, under the direct patronage of the god Tingou. Attired after the fashion of the Middle Ages, they bore upon their shoulders a splendid pair of wings; but what especially distinguished them was the long noses which were fastened to their faces, and the uses which they made of them. These noses were made of bamboo, and were five, six, and even ten feet long, some straight, others curved, some ribboned, and some having imitation warts upon them. It was upon these appendages, fixed tightly on their real noses, that they performed their gymnastic exercises. A dozen of these sectaries of Tingou lay flat upon their backs, while others, dressed to represent lightning-rods, came and frolicked on their noses, jumping from one to another, and performing the most skilful leapings and somersaults. As a last scene, a "human pyramid" had been announced, in which fifty Long Noses were to represent the Car of Juggernaut. But, instead of forming a pyramid by mounting each other's shoulders, the artists were to group themselves on top of the noses. It happened that the performer who had hitherto formed the base of the Car had quitted the troupe, and as, to fill this part, only strength and adroitness were necessary, Passepartout had been chosen to take his place.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Discover The Nature

item.title: Grass
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
One, with a fan and some bits of paper, performed the graceful trick of the butterflies and the flowers; another traced in the air, with the odorous smoke of his pipe, a series of blue words, which composed a compliment to the audience; while a third juggled with some lighted candles, which he extinguished successively as they passed his lips, and relit again without interrupting for an instant his juggling. Another reproduced the most singular combinations with a spinning-top; in his hands the revolving tops seemed to be animated with a life of their own in their interminable whirling; they ran over pipe-stems. The edges of sabres, wires and even hairs stretched across the stage; they turned around on the edges of large glasses, crossed bamboo ladders, dispersed into all the corners, and produced strange musical effects by the combination of their various pitches of tone. The jugglers tossed them in the air, threw them like shuttlecocks with wooden battledores, and yet they kept on spinning; they put them into their pockets, and took them out still whirling as before. It is useless to describe the astonishing performances of the acrobats and gymnasts. The turning on ladders, poles, balls, barrels, was executed with wonderful precision. But the principal attraction was the exhibition of the Long Noses, a show to which Europe is as yet a stranger. The Long Noses form a peculiar company, under the direct patronage of the god Tingou. Attired after the fashion of the Middle Ages, they bore upon their shoulders a splendid pair of wings; but what especially distinguished them was the long noses which were fastened to their faces, and the uses which they made of them. These noses were made of bamboo, and were five, six, and even ten feet long, some straight, others curved, some ribboned, and some having imitation warts upon them. It was upon these appendages, fixed tightly on their real noses, that they performed their gymnastic exercises. A dozen of these sectaries of Tingou lay flat upon their backs, while others, dressed to represent lightning-rods, came and frolicked on their noses, jumping from one to another, and performing the most skilful leapings and somersaults. As a last scene, a "human pyramid" had been announced, in which fifty Long Noses were to represent the Car of Juggernaut. But, instead of forming a pyramid by mounting each other's shoulders, the artists were to group themselves on top of the noses. It happened that the performer who had hitherto formed the base of the Car had quitted the troupe, and as, to fill this part, only strength and adroitness were necessary, Passepartout had been chosen to take his place.
The poor fellow really felt sad whenmelancholy reminiscence of his youth!he donned his costume, adorned with vari-coloured wings, and fastened to his natural feature a false nose six feet long. But he cheered up when he thought that this nose was winning him something to eat.
He went upon the stage, and took his place beside the rest who were to compose the base of the Car of Juggernaut. They all stretched themselves on the floor, their noses pointing to the ceiling. A second group of artists disposed themselves on these long appendages, then a third above these, then a fourth, until a human monument reaching to the very cornices of the theatre soon arose on top of the noses. This elicited loud applause, in the midst of which the orchestra was just striking up a deafening air, when the pyramid tottered, the balance was lost, one of the lower noses vanished from the pyramid, and the human monument was shattered like a castle built of cards! It was Passepartout's fault. Abandoning his position, clearing the footlights without the aid of his wings, and, clambering up to the right-hand gallery, he fell at the feet of one of the spectators, crying, "Ah, my master! my master!"

item.title: Another Gallery Post
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady

item.title: Left Content w/ Sidebar
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
However hard he threw himself onto his right, he always rolled back to where he was. He must have tried it a hundred times, shut his eyes so that he wouldn't have to look at the floundering legs, and only stopped when he began to feel a mild, dull pain there that he had never felt before. "Oh, God", he thought, "what a strenuous career it is that I've chosen!
Travelling day in and day out. Doing business like this takes much more effort than doing your own business at home, and on top of that there's the curse of travelling, worries about making train connections, bad and irregular food, contact with different people.

I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single.[/ultimate_heading][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][ult_animation_block animation="fadeInRight" animation_duration="1" animation_delay="0" animation_iteration_count="1"][sy_skillbar skill="Photographing " percent="86" height="7" bg_color="#ffffff" bar_color="#00afd1" radius="0"][sy_skillbar skill="Mountain Hiking" percent="97" height="7" bg_color="#ffffff" bar_color="#289fca" radius="0"][sy_skillbar skill="Documentaries " percent="80" height="7" bg_color="#ffffff" bar_color="#289fca" radius="0"][/ult_animation_block][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table - Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame. A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart.

item.title: Simple Slider
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
However hard he threw himself onto his right, he always rolled back to where he was. He must have tried it a hundred times, shut his eyes so that he wouldnt have to look at the floundering legs, and only stopped when he began to feel a mild, dull pain there that he had never felt before. Oh, God, he thought, what a strenuous career it is that Ive chosen!
Travelling day in and day out. Doing business like this takes much more effort than doing your own business at home, and on top of that theres the curse of travelling.

item.title: Ship Your Idea
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.
item.excerpt:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Woo Ninja
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Happy Ninja
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: Pellentesque habitant morbi tristique senectus et netus et malesuada fames ac turpis egestas. Vestibulum tortor quam, feugiat vitae, ultricies eget, tempor sit amet, ante. Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

Donec eu libero sit amet quam egestas semper. Aenean ultricies mi vitae est. Mauris placerat eleifend leo.

item.title: Wonderful Nature
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady

item.title: Full w/ Right Sidebar
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1452758737358{margin-top: 7px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #111111 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454623256190{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://sayenthemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/lans-10.jpg?id=1507) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][ultimate_spacer height="550" height_on_tabs_portrait="450" height_on_mob="350"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452815240927{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][bsf-info-box icon="Defaults-fire" icon_size="52" icon_color="#ffffff" title="Proinele Ullamcorpe" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:22px;" title_font_color="#ffffff" desc_font_size="desktop:16px;" desc_font_color="#aaaaaa"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.

[/bsf-info-box][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1452815269127{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1452815208544{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454623283428{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://sayenthemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/lans-7.jpg?id=1504) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][ultimate_spacer height="550" height_on_tabs_portrait="450" height_on_mob="350"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment.
His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked. "What's happened to me? " he thought. It wasn't a dream. His room, a proper human room although a little too small, lay peacefully between its four familiar walls.
A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table - Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame. It showed a lady fitted out with a fur hat and fur boa who sat upright, raising a heavy fur muff that covered the whole of her lower arm towards the viewer.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Full w/ Left Sidebar
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1452814903346{margin-top: 7px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #f6f6f6 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454623185800{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://sayenthemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/01/lans-3.jpeg?id=1500) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][ultimate_spacer height="550" height_on_tabs_portrait="450" height_on_mob="350"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1452814889681{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;}"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1452758205875{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-right: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;margin-left: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;background-color: #111111 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1452815021745{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;}"][bsf-info-box icon="Defaults-fire" icon_size="52" icon_color="#ffffff" title="Proinele Ullamcorpe" pos="top" title_font_size="desktop:22px;" title_font_color="#ffffff" desc_font_size="desktop:16px;" desc_font_color="#aaaaaa"]

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.which was created for the bliss of souls like mine.

[/bsf-info-box][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1454620590288{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;background-image: url(http://sayenthemes.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/02/pexels-photo.jpg?id=1225) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][ultimate_spacer height="550" height_on_tabs_portrait="450" height_on_mob="350"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment.
His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked. "What's happened to me? " he thought. It wasn't a dream. His room, a proper human room although a little too small, lay peacefully between its four familiar walls.
A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table - Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame. It showed a lady fitted out with a fur hat and fur boa who sat upright, raising a heavy fur muff that covered the whole of her lower arm towards the viewer.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: Even the all-powerful Pointing has no control about the blind texts it is an almost unorthographic life One day however a small line of blind text by the name of Lorem Ipsum decided to leave for the far World of Grammar.

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: The copy warned the Little Blind Text, that where it came from it would have been rewritten a thousand times and everything that was left from its origin would be the word "and" and the Little Blind Text should turn around and return to its own, safe country.

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: But nothing the copy said could convince her and so it didnt take long until a few insidious Copy Writers ambushed her, made her drunk with Longe and Parole and dragged her into their agency, where they abused her for their projects again and again. And if she hasnt been rewritten, then they are still using her.

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now.

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream.

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now. When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my tree

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: Few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects.

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: Sed ut perspiciatis unde omnis iste natus error sit voluptatem accusantium doloremque laudantium, totam rem aperiam, eaque ipsa quae ab illo inventore veritatis et quasi architecto beatae vitae dicta sunt explicabo

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: Nemo enim ipsam voluptatem quia voluptas sit aspernatur aut odit aut fugit, sed quia consequuntur magni dolores eos qui ratione voluptatem sequi nesciunt. Neque porro quisquam est, qui dolorem ipsum quia dolor sit amet, consectetur, adipisci velit, sed quia non numquam eius modi tempora incidunt ut labore et dolore magnam aliquam quaerat voluptatem.

item.title: Kameleon Forum Topic
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean. A small river named Duden flows by their place and supplies it with the necessary regelialia. It is a paradisematic country, in which roasted parts of sentences fly into your mouth.

item.title: Headers 1
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.

item.title: Forum Topic 2
item.dc:creator: Slim Shady

I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now. item.dc:creator: Slim Shady

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections.

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked.

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: "What's happened to me? " he thought. It wasn't a dream. His room, a proper human room although a little too small, lay peacefully between its four familiar walls. A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table - Samsa was a travelling salesman

item.dc:creator: Slim Shady
item.content:encoded: And above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame
